name: Hello Christmas 2018
description:
Hello Christmas 2018 : Room Decor is the new way to design your own dream room.

Its Christmas Eve decorate your room as beautiful as you can & make this eve memorable. A relaxing & fun game that enables you to live the life of an interior & room decorator. Decor your room in your own style & enjoy. Have epic fun on this Christmas Eve.

With this room decorating game you can select a room of your own choice before decoration. Different room furniture categories are available to choose from. Show your creativity to your room by choosing a couch, curtains, lights, floor, carpets, walls, wardrobe, machine, sofa, Christmas tree and many more. Decor more creatively and earn more coins. Unlock the things by earning more coins or you can purchase them.

Let’s this Christmas be a fun!

Hello Christmas 2018 : Room Decor Features:
• Select the things of your own choice to decor
• Real life 3D room graphics
• Smooth background music
• Easy & fun to play
• Decorate the room with different objects
• Change the floor, tiles or carpet to add that extra effect
